overview: Paul is a middle aged director of TV commercials who has a longstanding on-again, off-again relationship with actress Lisa (Diane Miller) when he marries much younger fledgling writer Caroline (Gena Lee) out of the blue. Initially apprehensive of one another, the two women end up falling in love, excluding Paul from their union with terrible results.
tagline: Is It Perversion or Is It Love?
title: Paul, Lisa and Caroline
